message: Unless you want tinned (synthetic) whitefish or tuna, all fish at UG is local. So in the case of Mira in the mid-Atlantic, it’s likely tuna, scabbardfish, mackerel and seabream. That sort of thing.
message_html: Unless you want tinned (synthetic) whitefish or tuna, all fish at UG is local. So in the case of Mira in the mid-Atlantic, it’s likely tuna, scabbardfish, mackerel and seabream. That sort of thing.
